name: Unplugged (Random Thoughts)
description:
Portable chargers are chasing you now?! THE TABLES HAVE TURNED!!

BE CAREFUL!

Your health is also your ammunition, which is also your fuel. Move to shoot and shoot to move, but too much of either will cause you to die!

WATCH OUT!

Portable chargers that want your power (aka health) will chase and lunge after you!

BUT DON'T WORRY

The blue power cubes will provide safe havens for you! They recharge your health while also granting you immunity so you can be safe while also providing you with unlimited ammunition, so fire away! (You can't move though...)

How long can you survive? Let's find out!
